website_summaries.verdict: This headrest DVD player system offers a combination of modern features and some potentially frustrating quality concerns.
pros: Features dual nine-inch monitors with HD video quality and responsive touchscreens
Compatible with some wireless game controllers and 32-bit games
Headphones that come with system feel durable
cons: Pricey and not compatible with all headrests
Some reports of systems failing after a few months of use

customer_reviews.title: If you get one that is all there and functional then it will work fine. But the quality is really really poor for ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered one set for a trip and all of the hardware was not in the box. So amazon sent me a second set overnight. I received them and only one of them worked. I decided to use the hardware from the second set to make the first set work only to find out that the first set didnt have the threading cut into the bottom to allow the adjustment rods to thread into the unit. Strange issues. If you get one that is all there and functional then it will work fine. But the quality is really really poor for the price. I sent both sets back.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew C.

customer_reviews.title: Just
customer_reviews.text: Really good products the headphones that came with them are easy to break down
customer_reviews.author: Diego castro

customer_reviews.title: Best Purchase Ever!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I were very apprehensive about these because of the reviews. We bought these anyway and I’m so happy we did!! Not one regret! We have 3 girls and there’s not a peep from them when traveling. A lot of people complained about them not working. Be sure to check the fuse inside the cigarette lighter plug in (power plug) We did have to replace that but other then that they both work great. I have black leather interior and it’s amazing at how well it matches. Headphones and remotes work awesome as well! Stop thinking and just buy them, you won’t regret it either
customer_reviews.author: Windysails841

customer_reviews.title: It also does not connect to the ear phones half of the time very frustrating for our kids so very disappointed for the price
customer_reviews.text: do not buy have not even had a year and dvd player does not load most of the time. It also does not connect to the ear phones half of the time very frustrating for our kids so very disappointed for the price paid
customer_reviews.author: Sarah M.

customer_reviews.title: Great picture quality
customer_reviews.text: The picture is very clear and you can hear it well without headphones. I love that it comes with a cover. Switching from watching a dvd or playing a game is very easy for my boys. I cannot get it to play any other video from a USB and the manual doesn’t really specify other, that is the only con. Fit perfectly in my Rover 2015 and the color matched perfect as well. Dark grayish black. Great price for the quality of headrests.
customer_reviews.author: cynthia santos

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great set up for the money, all work amazing. Install to the factory seats is a little cheap but not bad.
customer_reviews.author: Jesson Vasey

customer_reviews.title: DVD player
customer_reviews.text: Installed easily. Wish it was more adjustable as to bring the headrest forward to support front seat passengers head better. Kids love them. They have great picture quality and the wireless headsets are GREAT!!!! Each kid can watch their own movie or the same one, whatever makes them happy.
customer_reviews.author: Chris H.

customer_reviews.title: Hope it has warrranty
customer_reviews.text: terribe , it started to don't work properly these past 2 months. the audio doesn't work in one of those and tthe other one freeze all the time the video that my daughters start to freak out. And I havent even use it a lot , I hope it has warranty
customer_reviews.author: Renzo Ciccia

customer_reviews.title: Worked! Easy to Install
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Add esthetic to the vehicle. Kids love it
customer_reviews.author: Raheem Seyi

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t stay on
customer_reviews.text: I can’t get it to stay on for more than 30-45 seconds at a time. Going down the road it constantly shut off and on. We even tried multiple discs to make sure it wasn’t the DVD. We finally just shut it off for the trip.
customer_reviews.author: Karren

customer_reviews.title: One of the units seemed to get too hot in ...
customer_reviews.text: One of the units seemed to get too hot in the car during the summer and the sides expanded and the display fell forward. The clips that held them in on each side would no longer hold the display in. The other has a DVD that will not eject and has been that way for several months now.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Rodrguez

customer_reviews.title: SHAM! DO NOT PURCHASE!
customer_reviews.text: They look nice, but that is about it. One of the DVD players screeches when it is on, both sets of bluetooth headphones only work when they want to, the USB and headphone ports both do not recognize that anything is plugged in, and they do not fit tightly into the seat, so they wobble if touched. To top it off we will have to lose a dvd since one of the headrests ate our movie. Worst product ever!
customer_reviews.author: BMW

customer_reviews.title: I received a defected product
customer_reviews.text: The product I received was not like what was described on the web.
customer_reviews.author: M. A. Victor

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: easy to install and easy to use. great product for the value price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I totally recommend this ítem
customer_reviews.text: Exclent product! I totally recommend this ítem! Easy to install and operate. Nice resolution at all... I receive it on time. The displays are touchscreen, so it is more easy for kids.
customer_reviews.author: julio cesar palacios mullcue

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Work great, has been installed for 4 months with no problems. All you people complaining about no sound make sure your headphones are not selected in the menu if your going to listen to it without them!
customer_reviews.author: john gautreau

customer_reviews.title: My kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: My kids love it!! It fit all 3 of our vehicles! One player started skipping a little bit during one trip but other than that no issues. I do wish you could lock the screen so toddlers can't play with the screen.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: perfect It has any type of car and works perfect
customer_reviews.author: nerys robles

customer_reviews.title: Installation went easily and well works perfect will be back to all the more
customer_reviews.text: Installation went easily and well works perfect will be back to all the more

customer_reviews.title: Delivered broken
customer_reviews.text: One of the screens came broken and there isn't an option to exchange one screen. Only to send back entire package, get refund, and purchase again. That's a pain!
customer_reviews.author: Kaila Pitts

customer_reviews.title: With the speakers were better
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty nice, the speaker volume is quite low as others have stated but with the headphones they work great. Not a whole lot of head support in the front seat though :/
customer_reviews.author: Beth Calvin

customer_reviews.title: Back seat is never boring!
customer_reviews.text: Works as described but not as clear as I like.
customer_reviews.author: Danyl

customer_reviews.title: Nice headset
customer_reviews.text: Little tricky on the screen as you have to press semi hard. But has a nice picture and great options for the price. Also the games keep the kids entertained for a long time.

customer_reviews.title: Love these things
customer_reviews.text: Love these things. My kids are both busy in the back seat watching movies, playing games. Easy install. Recommend getting extra headsets.
customer_reviews.author: mel

customer_reviews.title: Wont read discs
customer_reviews.text: The tv video players do not fit right into the headrest. The disc players for dvd constantly says "loading", and they never play. Do not purchase.

customer_reviews.title: Need to know if product will play XBox, PS Games, Nitendos, etc
customer_reviews.text: Game Format unknown. How can I play other games besides the disc product came with? Need game format.

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: Working well as presented... just getting pricey this time as i bought these item twice for our two cars

customer_reviews.title: Within an hour of using this system we had a ...
customer_reviews.text: Within an hour of using this system we had a dvd get stuck inside one of the units. When we got it out it was scratched up and ruined. About 8 hours down the road and the other unit stopped working altogether. The system is glitchy, cumbersome, and cheap. I'll be returning it this week
customer_reviews.author: Miles Witt Boyer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine but was missing a part I had to return it

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Package was soaked and wet. screen were scratched/damaged item appeared to be used.

customer_reviews.title: ... bought this for my grandson and it was a perfect gift.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson and it was a perfect gift. Thanks

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Not perfect, but GREAT value for the price. Also great customer service!!
customer_reviews.author: RFJ

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, great looking leather and fantastic picture. These keep both kids happy and have made the long car rides enjoyable again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looked at all the options and for the cost had ...
customer_reviews.text: Looked at all the options and for the cost had to try these.fit well in my suburban, install was relatively simple. Have one master and one slave so both kids can watch the same dvd or separate. Had for about 5 months and no issues. Would have been 5 stars if the volume was louder. Still loud enough that I have no complaint and if needed you can use the IR head phones.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew E Rea

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works awesome and looks factory in my 2013 Dodge Ram Laramie!
customer_reviews.author: jake gill

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I did not get my 2 headphone in the package
customer_reviews.author: Joel Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They're awesome and look so good in my car! Even the color matches almost perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: After one 1000 mile trip this is what I have experienced. The units have a good picture. The touch screen isn't very good but usable. The headphones are worthless. The sound keep turning off and on on both pairs. The Fm transmit sound is full of static know matter which channel it is on. You will need corded headphones to listen with decent sound. The owners manual is very poorly written. I still haven't figured out how to watch one DVD on both units. This is about what I expected for the money.
customer_reviews.author: markrei

customer_reviews.title: Just installed so not much use yet but nice looking product and glad I went with these over ...
customer_reviews.text: Just installed so not much use yet but nice looking product and glad I went with these over portable DVDs.
customer_reviews.author: Christine B.

customer_reviews.title: These are good quality and installed easily
customer_reviews.text: These are good quality and installed easily. Touch screens work nicely The games take awhile to load and are low quality graphics but they're free! For the price they are exceptional.
customer_reviews.author: Sean W.

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointing
customer_reviews.text: Super disappointed in this item. Purchased them Dec 30th, 2016 and it is March 1st, 2017. Within 2 months and about a dozen uses one unit has gone black and white and has no sound and the other unit won't respond to the hand remotes or handheld remote. They appear nice but the quality is sub par at best.
customer_reviews.author: Mira DiMaggio

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was nice to see the Kid's happiness in looking the monitors.
customer_reviews.author: Cliente Kindle

customer_reviews.title: Flat black finish
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the black and the finish on them is very flat I've never seen a flat black finish in any car upholstery before it really stuck out and did not look good at all I sent them back
customer_reviews.author: Martin Quandel

customer_reviews.title: Item does not fit specified vehicle as noted
customer_reviews.text: This item was specified to fit a 2014 GMC Acadia SLT and I received the product and it does NOT fit. The bars for the headrest are 3-4 inches wider than the bars for the factory headrest. How do I return this item?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The games r weak And the controllers don't work well ...
customer_reviews.text: The games r weak And the controllers don't work well But the movie always start from the beginning not where one left off
customer_reviews.author: anthony cortes

customer_reviews.title: Soundless DVD players
customer_reviews.text: I had no issue installing the players my issue is the sound and lack there of. One of the DVD players makes a grinding noise. I have been in contact with XTRONs and have been amazing more than willing to help and allowing me to send back everything for a refund. I read in the previous reviews about the sound but thought it wasn’t that bad and it’s horrible. it’s not bad if you kids will use the headphones mine won’t.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for the buck..
customer_reviews.text: I did my research and the best bang for the buck without breaking the bank was this model. It is a large 9" screen as opposed to the next largest of 7" and the colors are great. It is certainly NOT HD quality but the picture is very nice. The most shocking and welcome surprise was that I ordered this on Sunday night and on Tuesday it was at my door on the East Coast..From Hong Kong. Very nicely done. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Hoypalloy

customer_reviews.title: I'm retired from the military and had no trouble following the directions although installation was so easy they really aren't n
customer_reviews.text: It appears to me that most of the adverse reviews here are a result of people not understanding how to install the players, not understanding how to operate them, or not understanding that a headrest is a safety device in a vehicle, not a comfort device. I got them today, installed them using the spacers today, hooked them up today and my 5 year old son was watching DVD's by two o'clock this afternoon with his headphones. No complaints--especially at this price. No, I don't work for the company, for amazon, and I paid full price. I'm retired from the military and had no trouble following the directions although installation was so easy they really aren't necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Coldiron

customer_reviews.title: Poor design
customer_reviews.text: The headrest post are so weak they snap and the player quits working because the headrest just dangles. It's so weak.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Kizer

customer_reviews.title: The headrest players are nice the headphones are cheap but i returned this item ...
customer_reviews.text: The headrest players are nice the headphones are cheap but i returned this item because it doesn't fit the new 2017 GMC Acadia body stlye headrest design is totally different.
customer_reviews.author: Firefighter8422

customer_reviews.title: these screens are awesome n look great
customer_reviews.text: Received package very fast...these screens are awesome n look great, GREat quality too.
customer_reviews.author: tiffani clack

customer_reviews.title: ... for about a month now and no issues and easy installation
customer_reviews.text: Had it for about a month now and no issues and easy installation
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: They work good..
customer_reviews.text: They work good..... The install was a little too complicated to do myself, but it only cost $129 @ Best Buy and the installers did a great job... the product works great and the headsets provide excellent sound.... I even have them joined, so the left player can play through the right one so both can watch the same things.... the games are basic 8 bit, but I didn't expect anything more, but it keeps the kids busy and that is the purpose...
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Burns

customer_reviews.title: Trip Saver!!!
customer_reviews.text: We received the product sooner than expected. The product functions perfectly and is very user friendly. Shortly after receiving and installing this product, we went on a family road trip which was over 1,200 miles and don't know how we would have done it without these. We also needed to contact the seller and their response was very prompt and they were very helpful. We highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Maren

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking screens easy to hook up. Only problem are the adjustable post
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: This is the worst product i ever bought at amazon
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst product i ever bought at amazon... the are not working and the manufactwr never answer back i bought a 2 year extra warranty and never honored plus amazon wash their hands and didnt o anything about it
customer_reviews.author: Karen Anguiano

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: I like the Price and Free Rapid shipping. Got my Monitors in two days from Hong Kong. Great deal for the price. The only down side of the monitors is the that Once you turn off the Vehicle the Movie starts over from the Begininng. Not like your usual DVD player that starts from where you last left off. I love the fact they are Touch screen and they both have there own individual DVD player .
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought them for my 14 camry, they didn't fit that firm, but they look good
customer_reviews.author: STT

customer_reviews.title: Static in headset and LOW volume.
customer_reviews.text: As previously stated the volume is extremely low so if you have young children 2 -3 years old the headset will probably not fit them so they are dependant on the volume in the headrest. So know in advance it is very low. Also, one of my headsets had static in it. I have asked for a new one to be shipped but as of today I don't have a response.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Stapleton

customer_reviews.title: They are like built in but not as expensive
customer_reviews.text: They are like built in but not as expensive. I had to take them to an audio shop to install because I didn't want to mess up my seats.
customer_reviews.author: Burt Owings

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Value
customer_reviews.text: I got these when my little girl was born. She is now 2 and they are still working perfectly. I had them professionally installed. Sound through the radio speakers and it never skips. I recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua B.

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for a year
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for a year, then tv fell right out of head rest, breaking the wiring inside. Using the other one still. But disappointed one is out of commission.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: If you are looking for something permanent and really nice keep looking
customer_reviews.text: It will do until I have the roof DVD player bought and mounted. Needed something fast for our upcoming trip and this will definitely do the trick. If you are looking for something permanent and really nice keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DVDs play well and the screens looks great. One unit however stopped ejecting and ate my ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in February. DVDs play well and the screens looks great. One unit however stopped ejecting and ate my DVD. Then the mounting tabs broke off and the whole screen fell out of the headrest while driving. I realize they are from China, but for the money I expected them to work for more than 4 months.
customer_reviews.author: Mike H.

customer_reviews.title: Xtrons headrest DVD player is built with good to great materials
customer_reviews.text: Xtrons headrest DVD player is built with good to great materials. Although the instructions were somewhat oblige, the installation was quite easy. Only downside is the fact that the USB/SD ports only read AVI format at 360p resolution. Anything above 360p format will initiate an error display.
customer_reviews.author: Chris K

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: No auto play. each time I cur the car off it starts back over.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is CRAP!
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working and doesnt stay on! 5 minutes after installing just shut off, powered down and restarted, same result. This is CRAP!
customer_reviews.author: Michael L.

customer_reviews.title: Nice functionality, but there's an audible beep every time ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice functionality, but there's an audible beep every time you press an on-screen button that cannot be turned off. Very annoying if you have liitle kids that like the press buttons.
customer_reviews.author: Jacksonville019283

customer_reviews.title: Great picture, and works good with the headphones
customer_reviews.text: Great picture, and works good with the headphones. Not very good in way of external speakers. If you hook this up to your car's auxillary input be ready to hook up a noise isolator, you'll need it.
customer_reviews.author: C. R. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Not the greatest quality. But they do as advertised. Great deal at this price too. Very easy install if you are even slightly mechanical. Just power and signal and your all set. Still have yet to get the USB to work, and the dvd starts over once the car ignition is started which bugs the kids, but a small price to pay for the benefit and a steal at this price.
customer_reviews.author: DTC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My kids love it...wasn't hard to install...great addtion to my Tahoe!
customer_reviews.author: Prince

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and has a cow Ieaner look than ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and has a cow Ieaner look than the players that just strap the the headrest. have had several different DVD players in my truck for the kid and these are the best. With them being touch screen the kids can use them without my help.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Russell

customer_reviews.title: these work great. love how they fit in my car
customer_reviews.text: these work great. love how they fit in my car. the kids love them.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, had good customer service and the kids love these.
customer_reviews.author: zo6

customer_reviews.title: Great DVDs player for the car
customer_reviews.text: Great DVDs player for the car. We have purchased 4 different ones and they all can not compare to these so far. We have an 8 and 4 yr old and they both can operate these with ease. Hoping they stand the test of time!
customer_reviews.author: erin medford

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great features. The brakets should have been a little more solid.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Villanueva

customer_reviews.title: Love the product
customer_reviews.text: Love the product, exelent screen, good definition with disney movies, the sound is a little low but when is connected with the car it sounds great, really recomended, my princess love it!!
customer_reviews.author: evelyn&maykel

customer_reviews.title: very nice
customer_reviews.text: They are good quality... The only reason why i gave it 4 stars instead of 5 is cause i am having a hard time keeping the headphones connected for some reason
customer_reviews.author: Imaaron44

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good we tested the units but have not installed them. We did have a small issue, first set that came one of the headrests were faulty. We had to return it ( we paid shipping) they claim they have refunded shipping I haven't seen it yet. But on the bright side I sent it the 17th and received the replacement today the 25th and it works! I am very pleased with the customer service rep. These aren't HD screens but will serve the purpose for my kids all under 8. Would have been 4 stars if we didn't have the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: So far So good. SUPER FAST SHIPPING!
customer_reviews.text: Super Fast Shipping. Have not installed as it was a Christmas gift but is brand new in box. looks good.
customer_reviews.author: ddc2shine

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Awful! If you don't have a professional do it, they are not going to work
customer_reviews.author: Kendra

product_meta.title: XTRONS Black 2X Twin Car headrest DVD Player 9" HD Touch Screen with FM Game Disc Mp3 IR Headphones
product_meta.description:
NOTE: 
Please check whether there is ABRS(air bag restraint system) inside your car's seat, If there is, this unit can NOT fit with your car.
This products may not be compatible for vehicles with Active headrest systems. 

Features: 
This color of this item is: BLACK 


Key Features:


Touch Screen:
The most convenient way to control your system. Make selections and adjust settings by clicking onscreen buttons and menus.

Digital Screen:
Enjoy your favourite videos by the digital screen (resolution: 800*480)

USB Port:
Supports USB drive and MP3 player with the maximum capacity of 32GB

SD Card Slot:
Supports SD & SDHC card with the maximum file limitation of 4GB *able to read 32GB SDHC card

Compatible Format (both USB&SD)
DIVX/MPEG/DAT/MOV/VCD/XVID/MP3/WMA/JPEG

Built-in Multi-region DVD Drive
Bring all your favourite DVD movies to the car and enjoy them by the Multi-region DVD drive.

Supported Languages: 
English/Chinese/German/Spanish/French/Portuguese/Italian

Compatible Format:
DVD/DVD-R/DVD-RW/VCD/DVD/SVCD/DIVX/MPEG4/CD/CD-R/MP3/WMA/JPEG

IR-TX:
This unit consists of an infrared receiver and transmitter, it is ideal for receiving sound within the car. The transmitters can be quickly connected to any IR device like headphones.

FM-TX:
FM transmits your music or audio over the strongest FM frequency available. The FM Transmitter will send the clearest signal at the push of a button, with no special installation or wiring.
feature_bullets: 【Built-in multi-region DVD drive】Bring all your favorite DVD movies to the car and enjoy them with the multi-region DVD drive. Compatible Formats: DVD / DVD-R / DVD-RW / VCD / DVD / SVCD / DIVX / MPEG4 / CD / CD-R / MP3 / WMA / JPEG
【9 Inch Touch Screen】Intuitive touch screen is most convenient way to control your system. Make selections and adjust settings by clicking on screen buttons and menus.
【Removable Flap Cover in High Quality】Removable Flap Cover protect your headrest DVD player while not in your vehicle.

【Multiple possibilities for sound out】Built-in IR transmitter - the IR transmitter allows you to enjoy the audio files with wireless headphones; Built-in speaker; Play audio directly from the device; Built-in FM transmitter can send the audio signal from the headrests to the other radio receiver (car radio), then you can share the sound with other people.

【1 YEAR WARRANTY】XTRONS backs this unit with a 1-year warranty and provides professional technical support. Please note that this unit may NOT be compatible with vehicles with Active headrest systems.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.4 out of 5 stars164 ratings3.4 out of 5 stars
